options.content:
## Distributed Tracing

Traces from the backend API are collected via OpenTelemetry and sent to Tempo.

**[Open Trace Explorer in Tempo](/explore?orgId=1&left=%5B%22now-1h%22,%22now%22,%22Tempo%22,%7B%22queryType%22:%22nativeSearch%22,%22serviceName%22:%22beacon-library-api%22%7D%5D)** to search for traces by service, operation, or trace ID.

Logs include `trace_id` for correlation with distributed traces.
